mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.venue_id AS "reserveVenue.id", a.field_id AS "reserveField.id", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.period_num AS "periodNum", a.start_date AS "startDate", a.end_date AS "endDate", a.cons_data_id AS "consData.id", a.frequency AS "frequency", a.cons_week AS "consWeek", v.name AS "reserveVenue.name", d.reserve_type AS "consData.reserveType", d.user_name AS "consData.userName", d.cons_type AS "consData.consType", d.cons_date AS "consData.consDate", f.name AS "reserveField.name", a.cons_price AS "consPrice", a.order_price AS "orderPrice", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN reserve_field f ON f.id = a.field_id LEFT JOIN reserve_venue v ON v.id = a.venue_id LEFT JOIN reserve_venue_cons d ON d.id = a.cons_data_id
mapper.select: SELECT a.order_price AS "orderPrice", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", f.name AS "fieldName" FROM reserve_venue_cons_item as a INNER JOIN reserve_venue_cons as b on a.cons_data_id=b.id INNER JOIN reserve_field as f on f.id=a.field_id WHERE b.id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve_venue_cons_item( id, start_date, end_date, cons_data_id, venue_id, field_id, cons_price, order_price, frequency, cons_week, cons_date, start_time, end_time, period_num, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, tenant_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{consData.id}, #{reserveVenue.id}, #{reserveField.id}, #{consPrice}, #{orderPrice}, #{frequency}, #{consWeek}, #{consDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{periodNum}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{tenantId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reserve_venue_cons_item SET start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, cons_data_id = #{consData.id}, venue_id = #{reserveVenue.id}, field_id = #{reserveField.id}, frequency = #{frequency}, cons_week = #{consWeek}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, period_num=#{periodNum}, cons_price = #{consPrice}, order_price = #{orderPrice}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, tenant_id = #{tenantId} WHERE id = #{id}
